edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.gamelogic

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.gamelogic.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Grid class is the foundation for minesweeper, applies mine locations, checks if something is open, makes flags functional, etc.
    Version:
    2015/03/04 for lab07, cs56, W15, July 2016 for Legacy Code, cs56, M16
    Author:
    Caleb Nelson, David Acevedo, Isaiah Egan, Austin Hwang, Sai Srimat, Ryan Wiener
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Grid.Clock
      Class that extends from TimerTask to keep track of users time on the current game
